revision.text:
{{Infobox Key Item |name = Explorer Kit |image = [[File:ExplorerKit_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Explorer Kit''. |use = Allows entry to the [[Underground]] |obtain = Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities|Cinnabar Island]] for 5000 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} }} ===Description=== A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the [[Underground]]. ===Acquisition=== Purchased from Cinnabar Island for 5,000 Quest points ===Effects=== You can mine in the [[Underground]] which is located on Route 11, or to the right of Vermillion City.


{{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
revision.comment: First draft with new image, infobox, and navbox
